publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5426 Iain Smith: Congratulations and Best Wishes to Bell Baxter High School Rugby Team—That the Parliament congratulates Bell Baxter High School Rugby team on being the first state school to reach the final of the Scottish Schools Rugby Championship for 10 years and wishes the team and its players every success in the final.

S2M-5426 Iain Smith: Congratulations and Best Wishes to Bell Baxter High School Rugby Team—That the Parliament congratulates Bell Baxter High School Rugby team on being the first state school to reach the final of the Scottish Schools Rugby Championship for 10 years and wishes the team and its players every success in the final.
S2M-5426 Congratulations and Best Wishes to Bell Baxter High School Rugby Team (lodged on 18 January 2007) Stewart Stevenson*
S2M-5426 Congratulations and Best Wishes to Bell Baxter High School Rugby Team (lodged on 18 January 2007) Mr Andrew Arbuckle*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-5426 Congratulations and Best Wishes to Bell Baxter High School Rugby Team (lodged on 18 January 2007) Nora Radcliffe*
